page.title: 16Mayland Fruit Farms
page.content: Mayland Fruit Farms are a firm based at Bradford_on_Tone but they have fourty acres of blackcurrent bushes on a site just outside Ford Street below the Blackdown Hills. This farm is owned and run by the Price family who have been involved in farming here since 1936. The crop is only made up of Blackcurrents.The average crop of about 90 tonnes per year is sold to "Ribena"at Coleford in Gloucester. Three men are employed full time while seven students are employed during machine harvesting time.
